body.name: HOMIDEC Closet Organizer, 9-Cube , Portable Storage Shelves for Garment Racks, Closet, Wardrobe
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 14. Order within 18 hrs 21 mins
features: 【Size & Material】: Each cube size is 11.8" x 11.8" x 11.8" (30 x 30 x 30cm), consisting of polyethylene plastic sheet, sturdy metal frame and ABS resin connectors.
【Bearing Capacity】: This cube is designed for storing home items, clothes, books, personal favorite items, etc. Each cube holds up to 10Lbs, so please don't put something too heavy on it.

【Stability】: Whether every cube sheet get well locked decides if you can get a strong structure. Our connector is made of ABS resin, inside is multilayer lock design so it won’t easily slides out. So we suggest you lock the sheet in deepest layer to get highest stability.

【Easy to assemble and disassemble】: It's a simple module structure. Following the guide, check if every sheet is fully locked in the connector after finishing every layer assembling, then, you shall get a firm storage organizer.

【Flexibility and Multi-purpose Use】: Any of these cubes can be removed out and used to build different shapes. With elegant color and size, you can put it in entryway, study room, bedroom, kids room or office. Such a great solution for lightweight storage needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together and very functional!
reviews.reviewText: My daughter moved into her first apartment and we needed something to put in her walk-in closet for putting sweaters, sweatshirts, etc on - things that wouldn't be hung up or go into dresser drawers. She and I were able to put it together, no problem! I did have to look online to see an actual picture (instead of just a drawing) as the instructions do not include any written instructions, just line drawings. It is sturdy, looks great in her closet, and holds a ton of stuff! Very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed a little extra storage for my walk in closet and didn't want to spend a lot. This works perfectly. Pretty sturdy and compact. I found assembly easy. If I can assemble this, anyone can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Could be stronger
reviews.reviewText: Yes I know my closet is messy but this works well in there. I love how you can change the configuration of this unit to make it fit how you need. They do come apart kinda easily so treat it gently. Since I keep it in my closet and it’s not a high traffic area, it stays together well

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy, Roomy, and Good Price
reviews.reviewText: Just as the title says, sturdy, roomy, and for a good price in my opinion. You can build it as it's intended, 3x3, or make it a different shape. The connector pieces allow you to build it however you want, including buying another set to snap onto the original so you can have 6x6 if you truly want. I was expecting these to be cloth, but these are very sturdy plastic.One tip though: make sure you *really* push down on the pieces into the connector pieces to get them to snap in all the way. I didn't push down all the way and had to dissemble midway because my corner pieces weren't reaching the plastic pieces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is sturdy for my needs, easy to put together and looks nice. Great value!!
reviews.reviewText: I am completely happy with my purchase of the shelving unit. I read the listing carefully and which is what you need to do.This cube is designed for storing home items, clothes, books, and personal favorite items (which is what it states in the listing, and that is just what it should be used for.It was neatly packed for me. Directions were easy to read and follow. Also came with mounting for the wall. For what I needed I did not have to use the straps. It came with extra parts also easy to take apart to reconfigureDid not take but 1/2 hour to 45 mins. to put together. The most consuming time was taking the parts out of the packages.As far as people saying it is not sturdy that depends on what you have in mind to put on the shelves. What it says about the weight is accurate and the measurements so if you read them then there should be no bad reviews unless it comes defective then just get a return and order another ( Company is good about returns since I had to do that)..THINGS HAPPEN

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They are okay
reviews.reviewText: So I purchased 2 of these at the same time. One of them was very easy to assemble however the other one was a nightmare. The second one the bars on a majority of the square pieces had been bent so they didn’t really click into place how they should have. I have it put together but one swift sneeze towards the thing might just make it come down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazingly sturdy, easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: We bought this as a temporary fix until shelves can be built but we are impressed! If we still build the shelves in our closet, we will use these somewhere else in the house. We got the gray that is translucent and it is very nice. These are men's size large sweaters in the photo.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not bad for what I needed it for.
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this for the long top shelf of a closet that I wanted to make more useful. It worked the way I wanted it to. Made multiple compartments and added more usage to the closet. But because I was using it for a shelf I didn't need the leg connectors at the bottom (would make it too tall). I needed it to sit flat on the existing shelf. Because I didn't use the leg connectors along the bottom I ran out of the main connectors. I had to use some of the leg connectors upside down on the top shelf because I ran out of the main connectors. They should include an extra package of these connectors because not everyone needs to put legs on the bottom of the unit. Also, the connectors are not easy to connect as the video claims. No way is this a "ten minute" project. It does get easier once you get the hang of it, but not as easy as product description and videos claim.If you can't find instructions, look in between the panels. I too thought they forgot to pack them and found them there.Also, in terms of stability, I see some complaints about the flimsiness. These are not wood cubicles. If you are looking for something that holds a lot of weight these are not what you want. They are good for holding clothes, shoes, pocketbooks, etc.
